title: Deals: OnePlus 9/Pro return to all-time lows at $269 off, Fitbit Versa 3 $180, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by all-time lows on the OnePlus 9/Pro at up to $269 off. That’s alongside both the Fitbit Versa 3 and Luxe wearables on sale from $100 and a one-day TCL Android Gold Box event. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: OnePlus 9/Pro return to all-time lows at $269 off, Fitbit Versa 3 $180, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: OnePlus 9 Pro has returned to the Amazon all-time low at $269 off alongside the standard OnePlus 9, plus Fitbit discounts and more.
